ing: 2 cups diagonally sliced fresh green beans
1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
des: "Light and crunchy, pan-fried green beans with lemon, garlic salt and pepper. Fresh and fast!"
ins: Heat the olive oil, butter and lemon juice in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the green beans, lemon zest, garlic salt and pepper. Cook and stir for about 10 minutes, or until beans are tender, but still a little crunchy.
